* [sync git]
* [sync actions]
* [skip actions]

## [Checks](https://help.github.com/cn/github/collaborating-with-issues-and-pull-requests/about-status-checks)

```bash
$ git commit -m "Update README.
>
>
skip-checks: true
```

```bash
$ git commit -m "Refactor usability tests.
>
>
request-checks: true
```
